description:
A cute adventure story about a rabbit, Ruku, and a cat, Lish, just like in a picture book.

Make a "heart balloon" with the flower puzzle.
How far can you fly in the sky?


＜＜　Easy puzzle game to collect flowers　＞＞
・Find two or more flowers of the same color next to each other.
・Press "A" or "touch" when you find it.
Now you can collect flowers and make heart balloons.
Let's make as many heart balloons as our target number!


＜＜　And much more　＞＞
・Free Mode" to continue to create heart balloons
・Turn all the flowers that appear into heart balloons! Puzzle Mode
・Gallery" where you can see extra illustrations and sheet music


＜＜　Can be played by two players　＞＞
In Free Mode, two players can play together by using a 'Joy-Con™ controllers', 'Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller', etc.
Two players cooperate to achieve a common goal!
name: Ruku's Heart Balloon
intro:
A story about the adventures of Ruku and Lish
With a heart balloon made from a flower puzzle
How far can they go?
